data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Let me be very clear: harassment of other employees is grounds for termination. I ____ received ____ than ____ complaint ____ your ____ over ____ past ____ months. You ____ to ____ more ____. I will be monitoring your interactions from here on out.
data.partBlankContent: Let me be very clear: harassment of other employees is grounds for termination. I ha__ received mo__ than o__ complaint ab___ your beha____ over t__ past t__ months. You ne__ to beh___ more approp_______. I will be monitoring your interactions from here on out.
data.fullContent: Let me be very clear: harassment of other employees is grounds for termination. I have received more than one complaint about your behavior over the past two months. You need to behave more appropriately. I will be monitoring your interactions from here on out.
data.answer: 让我说清楚:骚扰其他员工是解雇的理由。在过去的两个月里，我收到了不止一次关于你行为的投诉。你需要表现得更得体些。从现在开始我会监控你们的互动。
